page.title: 14NUCLEAR DUMPING
page.content: {BAND}and the local{M.P's}tackled the{ {Dept.of Environment}and gained the support of the leader of the{ {Opposition}and{Euro.M.P's.}Heated debates took place on{T.V.} December '84 saw sackfuls of cards delivered to{Parliament}from the children and adults of {Cleveland} including a huge Christmas card to the {Prime Minister}with the message"No Nuclear Dumping in Cleveland!" One of the organisers together with her 13 year old daughter said,"We hope to cause a stir and we are asking the Government to give back the joy of Christmas to Cleveland."
